page.title: 06THE DOCTORS SURGERY, HOPTON
page.content: In Hopton there are two doctors. One doctor is on duty 24 hours a day and the surgery is open between 9am. and 11am. Mondays to Fridays and 5pm. to 7pm. on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays. The family practice covers an area of approximately a ten mile radius and home calls are made when necessary. If the patient needs any medicine, then the surgery will dispense it provided the patient does not live within a mile of a chemist. There is a district nurse who looks after those who need regular help. A prescription costs Â£2.OO and appointments are free to those on the National Health scheme. Private patients are welcome too. The Hopton practice is new, very hygenic and helpful. Some records are on comput- ter; most are hand written. In August 1985 a dentist's surgery opens there.
